header.title: Tubly: Your Youtube Videos Summary Assistant
header.description: Sumamrize Youtube videos with the power of IA. Listen to audio summaries. Keep updated and save time!

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.welcome: Welcome to our app. By using our app, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.

usageLimits.title: 1. Usage Limits
usageLimits.description: Free users can summarize up to three 4-minute videos per day. Subscribers ($10/month) can summarize longer videos (up to 20 minutes) and receive audio summaries.

payments.title: 2. Payments
payments.description: Payments are processed securely via credit card. The subscription fee is non-refundable.

intellectualProperty.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: The app's functionality may use YouTube links, but we do not claim any ownership over the content found in those links.

changes.title: 4. Changes
changes.description: We may modify these terms at any time. It's your responsibility to review the terms periodically.

contact.title: 5. Contact
contact.description: If you have any questions, contact us at support@yourapp.com.

dataHandlingAndPrivacy.title: 6. Data Handling and Privacy
dataHandlingAndPrivacy.description: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand our practices.

liabilityLimitation.title: 7. Liability Limitation
liabilityLimitation.description: To the extent permitted by law, we're not liable for any indirect or consequential losses.

governingLawAndJurisdiction.title: 8. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLawAndJurisdiction.description: These terms are governed by the laws of [your jurisdiction]. Disputes will be resolved in [your jurisdiction's courts].

subscriptionCancellation.title: 9. Subscription Cancellation
subscriptionCancellation.description: You can cancel your subscription at any time, but no refunds will be issued for any unused portion of the subscription term.

customerSupport.title: 10. Customer Support
customerSupport.description: For any issues or inquiries, contact our customer support at support@yourapp.com.

termination.title: 11. Termination
termination.description: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

hero.title: Effortlessly Digest YouTube Content with AI-Driven Summaries and Audio Playback on Android
hero.paragraph_1: Introducing Tubly, your ultimate Android application for intelligent video summarization and audible insights. Powered by cutting-edge AI algorithms, Tubly not only transforms extensive YouTube videos into crisp, reader-friendly overviews but also allows you to listen to these summaries, thanks to its innovative audio feature. Now, whether you're hitting the gym or commuting, you can effortlessly catch up on your favorite content without missing a beat.
hero.paragraph_2: Engage your senses as you listen to summaries that align with your learning style and life pace.
hero.paragraph_3: Elevate your video interaction to unparalleled heights with Tubly. Immerse yourself in a wellspring of knowledge, supercharge your productivity, and harvest invaluable insights‚Äîvisually or audibly‚Äîwith absolute ease. Install Tubly today to unlock a multifaceted approach to streamlined video intelligence!
hero.phone_description: Watch less, learn more. Youtube videos summariazed with the power of AI!

features.title: All the features you need
features.description: You'll experience efficient video consumption like never before. Dive into the world of knowledge, boost productivity, and extract valuable insights with ease.

feature_time.title: ‚è∞ Time Stamps
feature_time.description: Tubly makes watching video summaries easy! Every summary comes with clickable timestamps, so you can jump straight to important parts in the video. No more searching long videos for key moments. With Tubly, it's all just one click away!

feature_openai.title: üß† Powered By ChatGPT & OpenAI
feature_openai.description: Tubly uses ChatGPT and OpenAI to make video summaries smarter. With top-notch language understanding, Summarify turns long YouTube videos into short, clear summaries. Our app uses OpenAI's cutting-edge tech to give you the best summaries out there.

feature_history.title: üìú Your Tubly History: Relive Every Insight!
feature_history.description: Lost in the vast sea of content? Want a quick revisit? With Tubly's Video History feature, every summary you've ever explored is neatly listed for your convenience. Go back in time, rediscover those golden insights, and never lose track of the videos you've delved into. Your past insights, now just a scroll away. Dive back in, anytime! üîÑüé•

feature_audio.title: üéß Tubly's Audio Summaries: Hear the Highlights!
feature_audio.description: Ever wished you could just listen to the main points instead of reading? Tubly's got you covered! Dive into our AI-powered audio summaries and get the essence of any video, without lifting a finger to read. Perfect for on-the-go learning or when you just want to sit back and soak in the content. With Tubly, video insights are now just a play button away. Experience clarity like never before ‚Äì all in the power of sound! üöÄüîä
